metadata.dc:author: Ardura, J
Mulas, M L
Tejeiro, M
metadata.dc:description: The authors comment on the signs found in utero in a case of Ebstein anomaly, by obstetrics and cross-sectional ultrasonography. They emphasize the possibilities and interest of these techniques in other prenatal diagnostic problems.
metadata.dc:title: Anomalía de Ebstein. Diagnóstico prenatal por ecocardiografía bidimensional.
[Ebstein's anomaly. Prenatal diagnosis with bidimensional echocardiography].
